name: Countdown World
description:
Countdown World is a level-based action-adventure game that requires players to explore a miniscape map under the curse of the countdown to complete puzzle challenges and ultimately pass levels. You need to collect time bonuses in levels or find abilities to unlock new explorable areas and find the right way to complete the adventure.

        There are currently 7 levels, each with different mechanics and scenarios. Besides passing them, you can also collect 3 hidden stars in each levels or complete special level challenges.

        During the creation process, we have studied Nintendo's game design ideas and created rich interaction and sound details, hoping to bring you a fun gaming experience.

        《倒计世界》是一款关卡制的动作冒险游戏，玩家需要在倒计时的诅咒下，探索箱庭式的地图，完成解谜挑战，最终通过关卡。玩家需要在箱庭中收集时间奖励以增大探索范围，或是找到能力解锁新的可探索区域，在时间循环中找到正确的方式完成冒险。

        游戏目前有7个关卡，每个关卡均有着不同的机制与场景，在通关的基础上，玩家还可以收集关卡中隐藏的星星，或是完成特殊的关卡挑战。

        在创作过程中，我们学习了任天堂的游戏设计思路，制作了丰富的交互与声音细节，希望给玩家带来有趣的游戏体验。

Level Design：杜恺 Kai Du    毛常松 Changsong Mao

Program：毛常松 Changsong Mao

3D Art：吴铂 Bo Wu    朱果 Guo Zhu    毛常松 Changsong Mao

2D Art：朱果  Guo Zhu

UI/UX：朱果  Guo Zhu    毛常松  Changsong Mao

Visual Effects Art：杜恺  Kai Du

Sound Design：吴天阳  Tianyang Wu

Music：李沅松  Yuansong Li    毛常松  Changsong Mao

Sound Effects：吴天阳  Tianyang Wu

Language Support

简体中文

English

繁體中文（翻譯中）

日本語（翻訳中）
